sys_metadata_link.payload:
Your navigator contains the following items.

]]> true 16a1997e2f3d0110152459a72799b607 false not requested ca8c03c0932b02100580f55a7bba10e7 product false automatic Feature 2022-06-16 12:28:35 35112313db3c94d04d8e2ded0b961921 false link to DIP update set: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1F00Wl44BkdiW0qav0WK79zyqELRmJtzy/view?usp=sharing As a user I want to synchronize incident tickets between two ServiceNow instances. Load DIP to your developer instance: 1. download DIP update set from link above. 2. on your developer instance go to "retrieved update sets". 3. import DIP update set from xml. 4. After import is done open the update set, preview it (in case of errors select "accept remote update" for all of them) and commit. 5. When the commit is completed you should be able to search for data integration platform in navigator. DIP documentation can be found in DIP itself. You can find it in ServiceNow help sidebar whenever you are at package or case form or table. Create your integration package : 1. Go to Data integration platform -> packages. You will see some default packages. 2. click new to create your own package, set the name of your package and define your trigger. Package trigger is the first thing that is evaluated whenever incident is created or updated. For example, if you want your integration to only trigger when specific assignment group is selected you can define it here as simple if statement. This is generic trigger for the whole integration, more specific triggers are defined later in cases. 3. set your package as active and save it. 4. After saving the package open it. In the related lists you should see Authorizations, Cases, Registers and Logs. Setup Authorization user: For DIP to be able to update and insert records based on incoming REST messages it needs to have user with "x_devo2_dip.Inbound API" role. On Demoinstance03 you can use predefined user "dip_technical". On your developer instance you have to create your own. 1. In the authorizations related list click on new. 2. select viable user and save. 1970-01-02 00:00:00 2022-02-24 2022-02-24 14:33:02 39398b0c93e702100580f55a7bba1007 0 4000000000 false 3 false false false true false STRY0010014 2022-02-24 14:33:02 6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441 100 16a1997e2f3d0110152459a72799b607 false 48d09f08932b02100580f55a7bba10e9 0 4 3398874c93e702100580f55a7bba10c0 100000 2 false true 2022-02-24 14:33:02 2022-02-24 14:33:02 false "install" DIP on your developer instance 48d09f08932b02100580f55a7bba10e9 100000 2022-02-24 2022-02-24 14:33:02 1 green rm_story admin 2022-02-24 14:38:15 global / 16a1997e2f3d0110152459a72799b607 29 admin 2024-09-02 09:37:16 "install" DIP on your developer instance​STRY0010014 STRY0010014 asap 20a707c893e702100580f55a7bba10fa Development proceed cancel 3 #ce7d81 700000 true image/png Pasted image.png e755e0c1a493665abc71e8202dc6d57c665628bf6f39669527bdb7cdd1bb4447 124 295 5347 5166 available admin.goran.djurovic 2022-06-24 14:06:11 db4acb951b585d10ac105391604bcbfb 3 admin.goran.djurovic 2022-06-24 14:06:11 rm_story 16a1997e2f3d0110152459a72799b607 H4sIAAAAAAAAAA== 16 0 db4acb951b585d10ac105391604bcbfb admin.goran.djurovic 2022-06-24 14:06:11 1f4acb951b585d10ac105391604bcbfb  6876 1 db4acb951b585d10ac105391604bcbfb admin.goran.djurovic 2022-06-24 14:06:11 9f4acb951b585d10ac105391604bcbfb
